/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are rich and varied, from the green of the trees and bushes to the blue of the sky and the various hues of the buildings. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of a busy city street in Beijing.
